biotools.summary: SMiPoly (Small Molecules into Polymers)" is rule-based virtual library generator for discovery of functional polymers. It is consist of two submodules, "monc.py" and "polg.py".

bioschemas.name: SMiPoly
bioschemas.summary: SMiPoly (Small Molecules into Polymers)" is rule-based virtual library generator for discovery of functional polymers. It is consist of two submodules, "monc.py" and "polg.py".
